p.k: A family of devout Jehovah's Witnesses - sisters Alex and Luisa and mother Ivanna - suffer a crisis of faith. BAFTA-nominated drama with Happy Valley's Siobhan Finneran
A father gets the chance to connect with the daughter he left behind after turning up unannounced on his ex-partner's doorstep. In French with English subtitles
85% Oscar-winning wartime romance starring Humphrey Bogart as an ex-pat bar owner torn between love and virtue. Ingrid Bergman co-stars as his former flame
69% Feelgood underdog tale following an unlikely New Jersey rapper desperate to escape her humdrum life and make it big. Danielle Macdonald stars
